channel.title: Michael Phelps
channel.description:
http://www.newsoftheworld.co.uk/news/150832/14-times-Olympic-gold-medal-winner-Michael-Phelps-caught-with-bong-cannabis-pipe.html
Well, it looks like Shaun White isn't the only Olympic athlete who indulges in herbal remedies. Does this mean that Phelps won't be appearing in any more [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_R228MSqhm8]goofy commercials[/url]? Will he lose his corporate sponsors? Unlikely. Shaun White was outed as a pothead yet his career does not appear to have suffered a dramatic downturn.
It has always been a difficult problem for government programs like "[url=http://www.abovetheinfluence.com/]Above the Influence[/url] to condemn potheads as losers and the herb itself as something dangerous and evil, when so many successful and brilliant individuals are casual tokers. Phelps has been lionized by a media intent on promoting the great American meritocracy, the same media which pointless propagates the marijuana myth. Is the day coming when weed will be legalized? Only if Phelps and other smokers in the spotlight actually stand up for their rights.

item.title: Michael Phelps
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

Greedy oil companies? Seriously?
Nooo! Don't get jme started.

I used to believe pot wasn’t as bad as people told me, and i still do actualy.
But, when i used to smoke, i got really lazy.
I also got dumber and my grades went downhill.

No more dreams for a good wealthy future.
Just a drink and some food while watching some retard movie and my day was complete.

item.title: Michael Phelps
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

I hate people who always believe in what people have pounded into them through out there life. Dugs are bad, OH MY GOD I’M NOT GOING TO TOUCH/DO/ ANY DRUGS AND I DONT PLAN TO BLAH BLAH ONLY BECAUSE I’VE BEEN TOLD TO. Meh: go and see if it’s really that bad if you’ve never tried anything.

OH and :

Ollie:

These guys are being mean, but behind the internet they speak the truth no matter how much it hurts, thats the brilliance of the internet. Take what has been said seriously, most of these guys know what they are talking about, and for those guys who dont, take what they say with a pinch of salt (you will get to know the truthful ones the longer you are here).

So true.

item.title: Michael Phelps
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“srt8, post:38, topic:259856”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=343121.msg2652964#msg2652964 date=1233636594]

We have been dating over a year. I believe the last time was Fall 07[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2009, 12:46:15 am[/size][hr][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=343121.msg2652958#msg2652958 date=1233636190]

I know he has. Wayyy before he met me though…Thank God! He would never do them now.

Michael Phelps isn’t any different, other than he is exceptional athelete.

Are you saying Travis isn’t an exceptional athlete?!
[/quote]
Judging by the pictures of him, I’d say he’s far from an athlete. That’s fine, it’s not my place to decide, he’s obviously a person who excells in the technology world, as Phelps excells in cutting the 50 metre pool in record times. However, there are places where I don’t know (AND WOULD NOT LIKE TO FIND OUT THANK YOU VERY MUCH) how Travis performs
[/quote]

lol, you guys are so mean. But point taken[/quote]
We’re not really being mean, but when you compare possibly one of the fittest athletes in the world, to a runescape cheater, odds are you’re in the wrong

item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

I don’t see why everyone hates drugs, I personally have never done them but I still remain open to them. You know your precious husband has done weed before, and he drinks alcohol, what’s the difference? Alcohol is probably worse for you than weed (presuming you’re not smoking it 24/7).

item.title: Michael Phelps
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:20, topic:259856”][quote author=beans() link=topic=343121.msg2652409#msg2652409 date=1233607511]

He shouldn’t even apologize, he did nothing wrong imo

He only apologized because the public go crazy over things like this, I would’ve done the same if I was in his position.

Yeah, wonder what situation would be caused if he did heroine.

Heroine is one of the worst drugs I can think of, once you’re addicted to heroine you can’t get out. If you try to stop you’ll end up killing yourself from not smoking heroin, or if you’re addicted you’ll die smoking it. Weed can be a one time thing or an addiction.
[/quote]
I think you got me wrong, I meant: Since the public went crazy over weed what would they do if he did heroin?[/quote]
Probably the exact same thing, weed is considered to be as bad as heroin.

Read full topic

item.title: Michael Phelps
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“srt8, post:27, topic:259856”][quote author=pko link=topic=343121.msg2652785#msg2652785 date=1233625486]
if it’s not to personal of a question, have you tried it?
[/quote]

I have not. I have never done any drugs and don’t plan on it.

Pot isn’t for everyone. For some people it simply doesn’t feel good.

Str8 I bet you don’t mind getting shit faced on alcohol though, right? I hope you realize how much more damaging that is to your body, then smoking pot. There’s an interesting story behind pot being illegal, and it has nothing to do with health effects. It’s about greedy oil companies.

Yes, I like to drink and have fun.

Greedy oil companies? Seriously?[/quote]

Yep. It’s more over paper though. DuPont is the oil company I am talking about, who also owned the patent for paper from trees (and also owned a large amount of land that was full of timber). This was in the 30’s and marijuana can make 4 times more paper in the same amount of area of trees. It could also make plastic effectively, and dupont had patents for plastic from oil. It could also make durable clothes, rope, etc. Dupont had patents for nylon. DuPont couldn’t be making billions of dollars a year if they didn’t ban marijuana. Duponts chief financial backer had a nephew who was the head of the Bureau of Narcotics. They worked together to put out a lot of propaganda, with no research at all. Videos were made like reefer madness, showing that if you smoke marijuana you will go completely insane and kill yourself and your loved ones possibly. They also said it’s because niggers and mexicans smoke it, but thats another story.

It has gotten such a stigma attached now. Imo, theres no reason to drink alcohol, and think against others who smoke pot. Alcohol causes a lot more damage. The only thing smoking has on it, is the fact that your smoking and smoking anything can’t be good. But you can use a vaporizer or consume it orally. I’d also like to mention that it kills aging and mutating cells and prevents cancer.

You can find better sites with more info, but here’s some good pages to read.

http://www.erowid.org/plants/cannabis/cannabis_culture11.shtml This is basically expanding on what I was saying.

These are some good links to learn about what the studies show, though contradictory to what schools and parents will tell you

http://www.erowid.org/plants/cannabis/cannabis_myth16.shtml
http://www.erowid.org/plants/cannabis/cannabis_flyer1.shtml

This one was done by my countries government. They tried to give the most unbiased report they could.

erowid.org

cannabis_govreport1.pdf

255.18 KB

And alcohol is bad

amazon.com

Marijuana is Safer: So Why Are We Driving People to Drink? 2nd Edition

Steve Fox, Paul Armentano, Mason Tvert

4.9 out of 5 stars, $19.58


http://www.cbc.ca/health/story/2007/03/23/alcohol-tobacco.html
http://www.norml.org.nz/Marijuana/Alcohol_Worse_than_Cannabis.htm

You know why when you drink, you get drunk? Because if you got high from the alcohol, you would be doing drugs!! But drunk is just another word for being high on something.

Read full topic

item.title: Michael Phelps
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

weed isnt the least bit addictive. I have smoked weeks straight for past few years, and honestly, I have never had a ‘craving’ for weed. If I don’t have a cigarette every other day at the very LEAST, I am always in a real shitty mood, and feel terrible.

not to mention, POT ROCKS
